long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch Adblock
Block annoying ads on Twitch and other platforms and websites. This Advertisings Blocker for Chrome browser removes ads from all websites you visit and provides better privacy and data security by disabling suspicious and malicious actions of potentially harmful software and websites.

This Ad Blocker works not only on Twitch platform but also on:
-	Youtube
-	Instagram
-	Facebook
-	Twitter
and others

This anti advertising browser extension successfully removes following types of ads almost on all websites and platforms you visit which provides better user experience and faster operation:
-	Video Ads on YouTube, Twitch and other streaming and video hosting platforms
-	Popups, new tab redirects, popunders
-	Banners on all websites
-	Malicious and suspicious redirects when visiting online stores and other websites

Twitch Adblock has additional yet very important feature: providing data and privacy security. This adblocker disables data scraping, your personal data collection and transfer, different kinds of trackers and other tools which collect info about you personally and your browsing.
